overview: DeAngelo really wants a job at the massage parlor, and he will do whatever it takes to get it. His boss, Julian Grey, sees all the potential in DeAngelo especially his demanding physique. The other employees, Drew Dixon and Colby Tucker certainly know how to take care of their clients. Avery Jones teaches DeAngelo the ropes by giving him a private lesson. When DeAngelo's stepbrother Liam Cyber comes in for some TLC, that's when things get really hot!
title: Rubdown
